column4: Is there a way to remove or properly disable Pulseaudio  and still retain the volume control on the panel  W/ 10.04
pulseaudio isn't that easy to remove,  there are tutorials on the web
yeah pulseaudio issues in Ubuntu since 8.04, when they introduced it.  In some distros it's really easy to disable and without problems.
thnks I will just live without the volume icon
